channel.title: I think I got it..Do you agree?
channel.description:
Ok earlier I posted a topic asking what was wrong with this,
[img]http://img129.imageshack.us/img129/2619/deathartilleryissuehelpty8.png[/img]
It kept getting the java.lang.OutOfMemory error when ever I started the server and one person joined, well i added ALOT of things to the server..
So I tried another source and..IT WAS FINE!!
So i think the problem is that I have to much stuff on my server, do you think im right?

item.title: I think I got it..Do you agree?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

No, its how your compiling it

You probably have something like

Java -Xm521x -cp.;./SERVERDIRECTORY/

See the -Xm512x ? Thats a cap on the amount of memory you let the server use.

Make it something like -Xm2048x or remove it entirely.

Read full topic
item.source: I think I got it..Do you agree?
